0.1.name: wordpress/enable-image-scaling-option-on-upload
0.1.description:
Have problems with large images clogging up your uploads directory and taking up more space than necessary? Now you set a set of dimensions that all images will be scaled down to when uploaded through WordPress.

Complete 1.0 Rewrite!

  • Supports the new Media Manager workflow introduced in 3.5
  • 3.5 Only: Set custom height and width dimensions instead of resizing to the "large size" dimensions
  • Fully backward-compatible to WordPress 3.3

Now translated to Dutch! (thanks: Theo Houtman)

If you have a bug fix or wish to contribute, check out the GitHub repository. Pull requests welcome.
